title: Whiplash
simple_desc: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: The Pianist
simple_desc: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

title: Coco
simple_desc: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: Amadeus
simple_desc: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

title: Green Book
simple_desc: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

title: Some Like It Hot
simple_desc: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: Farewell My Concubine
simple_desc: Two boys meet at an opera training school in Peking in 1924. Their resulting friendship will span nearly 70 years and will endure some of the most troublesome times in China's history.

title: The Red Shoes
simple_desc: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

title: Autumn Sonata
simple_desc: A devoted wife is visited by her mother, a successful concert pianist who had little time for her when she was young.

title: La La Land
simple_desc: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: CODA
simple_desc: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults) Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her passion at Berklee College of Music and her fear of abandoning her parents.

title: Soul
simple_desc: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

title: Pink Floyd: The Wall
simple_desc: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

title: The Legend of 1900
simple_desc: A baby boy discovered on an ocean liner in 1900 grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.

title: Limelight
simple_desc: A fading comedian and a suicidally despondent ballet dancer must look to each other to find purpose and hope in their lives.

title: Almost Famous
simple_desc: A high-school boy in the early 1970s is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
simple_desc: The story of the legendary British rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid (1985).

title: The Blues Brothers
simple_desc: Jake Blues rejoins with his brother Elwood after being released from prison, but the duo has just days to reunite their old R&B band and save the Catholic home where the two were raised, outrunning the police as they tear through Chicago.

title: This Is Spinal Tap
simple_desc: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

title: Sing Street
simple_desc: A boy growing up in Dublin during the 1980s escapes his strained family life by starting a band to impress the mysterious girl he likes.

title: Three Colors: Blue
simple_desc: A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

title: Cléo from 5 to 7
simple_desc: Cleo, a singer and hypochondriac, becomes increasingly worried that she might have cancer while awaiting test results from her doctor.

title: Gully Boy
simple_desc: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

title: Walk the Line
simple_desc: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

title: Straight Outta Compton
simple_desc: The rap group NWA emerges from the mean streets of Compton in Los Angeles, California, in the mid-1980s and revolutionizes Hip Hop culture with their music and tales about life in the hood.
stars: ["O'Shea Jackson Jr.", 'Corey Hawkins', 'Jason Mitchell', 'Neil Brown Jr.']

title: All That Jazz
simple_desc: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid career of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.

title: Cabaret
simple_desc: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

title: Once
simple_desc: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

title: The Chorus
simple_desc: The new teacher at a severely administered boys' boarding school works to positively affect the students' lives through music.

title: A Night at the Opera
simple_desc: A sly business manager and the wacky friends of two opera singers in Italy help them achieve success in America while humiliating their stuffy and snobbish enemies.

title: Secret Superstar
simple_desc: A talented teenage singer-songwriter living amid domestic abuse becomes a YouTube sensation after a video in which she hides her identity goes viral.

title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
simple_desc: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

title: Sound of Metal
simple_desc: A heavy metal drummer's life is turned upside down when he begins to lose his hearing and he must confront a future filled with silence.

title: Ray
simple_desc: The story of the life and career of the legendary rhythm and blues musician Ray Charles, from his humble beginnings in the South, where he went blind at age seven, to his meteoric rise to stardom during the 1950s and 1960s.

title: Billy Elliot
simple_desc: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

title: Fantasia
simple_desc: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music, ranging from the abstract to depictions of mythology and fantasy, and settings including the prehistoric, supernatural and sacred.
directors: ['James Algar', 'Samuel Armstrong', 'Ford Beebe Jr.', 'Norman Ferguson', 'David Hand', 'Jim Handley', 'T. Hee', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Hamilton Luske', 'Bill Roberts', 'Paul Satterfield', 'Ben Sharpsteen']

title: The Double Life of Véronique
simple_desc: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

title: The Broken Circle Breakdown
simple_desc: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
simple_desc: A gender-queer punk-rock singer from East Berlin tours the U.S. with her band as she tells her life story and follows the former lover/band-mate who stole her songs.

title: The Triplets of Belleville
simple_desc: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

title: Rockstar
simple_desc: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

title: Joyeux Noel
simple_desc: In December 1914, an unofficial Christmas truce on the Western Front allows soldiers from opposing sides of the First World War to gain insight into each other's way of life.

title: Rock On!!
simple_desc: Four friends reunite to relive their moments of glory as a rock band.

title: Baby Driver
simple_desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

title: A Star Is Born
simple_desc: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: The Commitments
simple_desc: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

title: Nashville
simple_desc: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention.

title: Victor/Victoria
simple_desc: A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

title: La Vie En Rose
simple_desc: Biopic of the iconic French singer Édith Piaf. Raised by her grandmother in a brothel, she was discovered while singing on a street corner at the age of 19. Despite her success, Piaf's life was filled with tragedy.

title: Control
simple_desc: A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to commit suicide at the age of 23.

title: Shine
simple_desc: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

title: The Red Violin
simple_desc: A red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

title: Tár
simple_desc: Set in the international world of Western classical music, the film centers on Lydia Tár, widely considered one of the greatest living composer-conductors and the very first female director of a major German orchestra.

title: The Piano Teacher
simple_desc: A young man romantically pursues his masochistic piano teacher.

title: The Piano
simple_desc: In the mid-19th century a mute woman is sent to New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a farmer, but is soon lusted after by a farm worker.

title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
simple_desc: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

title: The Producers
simple_desc: A stage-play producer devises a plan to make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

title: Cold War
simple_desc: In the 1950s, a music director falls in love with a singer and tries to persuade her to flee communist Poland for France.

title: High Fidelity
simple_desc: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

title: Begin Again
simple_desc: A chance encounter between a down-and-out music-business executive and a young singer-songwriter, new to Manhattan, turns into a promising collaboration between the two talents.

title: Inside Llewyn Davis
simple_desc: A week in the life of a young singer as he navigates the Greenwich Village folk scene of 1961.

title: August Rush
simple_desc: An orphaned musical prodigy uses his gift to try to find his birth parents.

title: SLC Punk!
simple_desc: In the early 1980s Stevo, and Heroin Bob are the only two dedicated punks in conservative Salt Lake City.

title: Love & Mercy
simple_desc: In the 60s, Beach Boys leader Brian Wilson struggles with emerging psychosis as he attempts to craft his avant-garde pop masterpiece. In the 80s, he's a broken, confused man under the 24-hour watch of shady therapist, Dr. Eugene Landy.

title: Immortal Beloved
simple_desc: The life and death of the legendary Ludwig van Beethoven. Besides all the work he is known for, the composer once wrote a famous love letter to a nameless beloved, and the movie tries to ...                See full summary »

title: What's Love Got to Do with It
simple_desc: The story of singer Tina Turner's rise to stardom and how she gained the courage to break free from her abusive husband, Ike Turner.

title: Elvis
simple_desc: The life of American music icon Elvis Presley, from his childhood to becoming a rock and movie star in the 1950s while maintaining a complex relationship with his manager, Colonel Tom Parker.

title: Rocketman
simple_desc: A musical fantasy about the fantastical human story of Elton John's breakthrough years.

title: Tarzan
simple_desc: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

title: Across the Universe
simple_desc: The music of The Beatles and the Vietnam War form the backdrop for the romance between an upper-class American girl and a poor Liverpudlian artist.

title: Youth
simple_desc: A retired orchestra conductor is on vacation with his daughter and his film director best friend in the Alps when he receives an invitation from Queen Elizabeth II to perform for Prince Philip's birthday.

title: The Boat That Rocked
simple_desc: A band of rogue DJs that captivated Britain, playing the music that defined a generation and standing up to a government that wanted classical music, and nothing else, on the airwaves.

title: Hustle & Flow
simple_desc: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful hip-hop emcee.

title: Phantom of the Paradise
simple_desc: A disfigured composer sells his soul for the woman he loves so that she will perform his music. However, an evil record tycoon betrays him and steals his music to open his rock palace, The Paradise.

title: Mr. Holland's Opus
simple_desc: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

title: 24 Hour Party People
simple_desc: In 1976, Tony Wilson sets up Factory Records and brings Manchester's music to the world.

title: School of Rock
simple_desc: After being kicked out of his rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of an uptight elementary private school, only to try and turn his class into a rock band.

title: 8 Mile
simple_desc: Follows a young rapper in the Detroit area, struggling with every aspect of his life, wants to make it big but his friends and foes make this odyssey of rap harder than it may seem.

title: Top Secret!
simple_desc: An American rock and roll singer (Val Kilmer) becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist (Michael Gough) imprisoned in East Germany.

title: The Doors
simple_desc: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

title: Crazy Heart
simple_desc: A faded country music musician is forced to reassess his dysfunctional life during a doomed romance that also inspires him.

title: Strictly Ballroom
simple_desc: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.

title: Pump Up the Volume
simple_desc: Mark runs a pirate radio station and causes an uproar when he speaks his mind and enthralls fellow teens.

title: A Mighty Wind
simple_desc: Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.

title: It's All Gone Pete Tong
simple_desc: A famous DJ in the Ibiza club scene finds the alcohol and drug-fueled party that is his life threatened by the progressive loss of his hearing.

title: Brassed Off
simple_desc: The coal mine in a northern English village may be closing, which would also mean the end of the miners' brass band.

title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
simple_desc: A breathtaking, goose flesh igniting, awe inspiring love journey of an ordinary man Suri and his 'total opposite' love Taani.

title: Sweet and Lowdown
simple_desc: In the 1930s, jazz guitarist Emmet Ray idolizes Django Reinhardt, faces gangsters and falls in love with a mute woman.

title: The Beat That My Heart Skipped
simple_desc: Will Thomas still lead a life of crime and cruelty, just like his thuggish father, or will he pursue his dream of becoming a pianist?

title: Pitch Perfect
simple_desc: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

title: Nowhere Boy
simple_desc: A chronicle of John Lennon's first years, focused mainly in his adolescence and his relationship with his stern aunt Mimi, who raised him, and his absentee mother Julia, who re-entered his life at a crucial moment in his young life.

title: Kinky Boots
simple_desc: A drag queen comes to the rescue of a man who, after inheriting his father's shoe factory, needs to diversify his product if he wants to keep the business afloat.

title: Human Traffic
simple_desc: Five youngsters embrace the 90s clubbing scene on a drug-fuelled weekend of partying in Cardiff.

title: Fantasia 2000
simple_desc: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.
directors: ['James Algar', 'Gaëtan Brizzi', 'Paul Brizzi', 'Hendel Butoy', 'Francis Glebas', 'Eric Goldberg', 'Don Hahn', 'Pixote Hunt']

title: Dirty Dancing
simple_desc: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

title: Wayne's World
simple_desc: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

title: That Thing You Do!
simple_desc: A local Pennsylvania band scores a one-hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from their manager.

title: Green Room
simple_desc: A punk rock band is forced to fight for survival after witnessing a murder at a neo-Nazi skinhead bar.

title: Hairspray
simple_desc: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

title: The Dirt
simple_desc: Based on the bestselling autobiography from Mötley Crüe, the film is an unflinching tale of success and excess as four misfits rise from the streets of Hollywood to the heights of international fame.

title: Beaches
simple_desc: A privileged rich debutante and a cynical struggling entertainer share a turbulent, but strong childhood friendship over the years.

title: Sid and Nancy
simple_desc: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

title: Behind the Candelabra
simple_desc: A chronicle of the tempestuous six-year romance between megastar singer Liberace and his young lover Scott Thorson.

title: Coffee and Cigarettes
simple_desc: A series of vignettes that all have coffee and cigarettes in common.

title: Cadillac Records
simple_desc: Chronicles the rise of Chess Records and its recording artists.

title: Danny Collins
simple_desc: An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon.

title: Aashiqui 2
simple_desc: Rahul loses his fans and fame due to alcoholism. But he then decides to turn a small time singer into a rising star.

title: Weird: The Al Yankovic Story
simple_desc: Explores every facet of Yankovic's life, from his meteoric rise to fame with early hits like 'Eat It' and 'Like a Surgeon' to his torrid celebrity love affairs and famously depraved lifestyle.

title: Rio
simple_desc: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

title: Climax
simple_desc: French dancers gather in a remote, empty school building to rehearse on a wintry night. The all-night celebration morphs into a hallucinatory nightmare when they learn their sangria is laced with LSD.

title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
simple_desc: Two rock-'n-rolling teens, on the verge of failing their class, set out on a quest to make the ultimate school history report after being presented with a time machine.

title: Black Snake Moan
simple_desc: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it.
stars: ['Christina Ricci', 'Samuel L. Jackson', 'Justin Timberlake', 'S. Epatha Merkerson']

title: The Wedding Singer
simple_desc: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

title: Velvet Goldmine
simple_desc: In 1984, British journalist Arthur Stuart investigates the career of 1970s glam superstar Brian Slade, who was heavily influenced in his early years by hard-living and rebellious American singer Curt Wild.

title: La Bamba
simple_desc: Biographical story of the rise from nowhere of early rock and roll singer Ritchie Valens who died at age 17 in a plane crash with Buddy Holly and The Big Bopper.

title: Blinded by the Light
simple_desc: In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen.
stars: ['Billy Barratt', 'Ronak Singh Chadha Berges', 'Viveik Kalra', 'Lee Barnett']

title: Up in Smoke
simple_desc: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
simple_desc: The lives of two struggling musicians, who happen to be brothers, inevitably change when they team up with a beautiful, up-and-coming singer.

title: Ma Rainey's Black Bottom
simple_desc: Tensions rise when trailblazing blues singer Ma Rainey and her band gather at a recording studio in Chicago in 1927.

title: Frank
simple_desc: Jon, a young wanna-be musician, discovers he's bitten off more than he can chew when he joins an eccentric pop band led by the mysterious and enigmatic Frank.

title: Get on Up
simple_desc: A chronicle of James Brown's rise from extreme poverty to become one of the most influential musicians in history.

title: Vengeance
simple_desc: A writer from New York City attempts to solve the murder of a girl he hooked up with and travels down south to investigate the circumstances of her death and discover what happened to her.

title: Saturday Night Fever
simple_desc: Anxious about his future after high school, a 19-year-old Italian-American from Brooklyn tries to escape the harsh reality of his bleak family life by dominating the dance floor at the local disco.

title: Yesterday
simple_desc: A struggling musician realizes he's the only person on Earth who can remember The Beatles after waking up in an alternate reality where they never existed.

title: Horton Hears a Who!
simple_desc: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.

title: Meet the Robinsons
simple_desc: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

title: Tenacious D in the Pick of Destiny
simple_desc: To become the greatest band of all time, two slacker, wannabe-rockers set out on a quest to steal a legendary guitar pick that gives its holders incredible guitar skills, from a maximum security Rock and Roll museum.

title: Selena
simple_desc: The true story of Selena, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart-topping albums on the Latin music charts.

title: Judy
simple_desc: Legendary performer Judy Garland arrives in London in the winter of 1968 to perform a series of sold-out concerts.

title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
simple_desc: Singer Dewey Cox overcomes adversity to become a musical legend.

title: Detroit Rock City
simple_desc: In 1978, four rebellious teenagers try to scam their way into a KISS concert.

title: I'm Not There
simple_desc: Ruminations on the life of Bob Dylan, where six characters embody a different aspect of the musician's life and work.

title: Jersey Boys
simple_desc: The story of four young men from the wrong side of the tracks in New Jersey who came together to form the iconic 1960s rock group The Four Seasons.

title: Florence Foster Jenkins
simple_desc: The story of Florence Foster Jenkins, a New York heiress who dreamed of becoming an opera singer, despite having a terrible singing voice.

title: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
simple_desc: Our intrepid adolescent heroes wake up to find their beloved television stolen, and embark on an epic journey across America to recover it, and, who knows, maybe even score.

title: Quartet
simple_desc: At a home for retired musicians, the annual concert to celebrate Composer Giuseppe Verdi's birthday is disrupted by the arrival of Jean (Dame Maggie Smith), an eternal diva and the former wife of one of the residents.

title: Purple Hearts
simple_desc: In spite of their many differences, Cassie, a struggling singer-songwriter, and Luke, a troubled Marine, agree to marry solely for military benefits. But when tragedy strikes, the line between real and pretend begins to blur.

title: Empire Records
simple_desc: Twenty-four hours in the lives of the young employees at Empire Records when they all grow up and become young adults thanks to each other and the manager. They all face the store joining a chain store with strict rules.

title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
simple_desc: When it becomes clear that his solo album is a failure, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status.

title: Streets of Fire
simple_desc: A mercenary is hired to rescue his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.

title: Metal Lords
simple_desc: Two friends try to form a heavy metal band with a cellist for a Battle of the Bands.

title: Singles
simple_desc: A group of twenty-something friends search for love and success in grunge-era Seattle.

title: If I Stay
simple_desc: Life changes in an instant for young Mia Hall after a car accident puts her in a coma. During an out-of-body experience, she must decide whether to wake up and live a life far different than she had imagined. The choice is hers if she can go on.

title: Moxie
simple_desc: Inspired by her mom's rebellious past and a confident new friend, a shy 16-year-old publishes an anonymous zine calling out sexism at her school.

title: Leap!
simple_desc: An orphan girl dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees her rural Brittany for Paris, where she passes for someone else and accedes to the position of pupil at the Grand Opera House.

title: Notorious
simple_desc: The life and death story of The Notorious B.I.G. (a.k.a. Christopher Wallace), who came straight out of Brooklyn to take the world of rap music by storm.

title: Center Stage
simple_desc: A group of 12 teenagers from various backgrounds enroll at the American Ballet Academy in New York to make it as ballet dancers and each one deals with the problems and stress of training and getting ahead in the world of dance.

title: The Soloist
simple_desc: A newspaper journalist discovers a homeless musical genius and tries to improve his situation.

title: Taking Woodstock
simple_desc: A man working at his parents' motel in the Catskills inadvertently sets in motion the generation-defining concert in the summer of 1969.

title: A Monster in Paris
simple_desc: A 3D-animated movie set in Paris in the year 1910 and centered on a monster who lives in a garden and his love for a beautiful, young singer.

title: A Prairie Home Companion
simple_desc: A look at what goes on backstage during the last broadcast of America's most celebrated radio show, where singing cowboys Dusty and Lefty, a country music siren, and a host of others hold court.

title: Footloose
simple_desc: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

title: Fame
simple_desc: A chronicle of the lives of several teenagers who attend a New York high school for students gifted in the performing arts.

title: Dreamgirls
simple_desc: A trio of black female soul singers cross over to the pop charts in the early 1960s, facing their own personal struggles along the way.

title: Juliet, Naked
simple_desc: Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) has an unlikely transatlantic romance with once revered, now faded, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.

title: New York, New York
simple_desc: An egotistical saxophonist and a young lounge singer meet on VJ Day and embark upon a strained and rocky romance, even as their careers begin a long, uphill climb.

title: Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist
simple_desc: High school student Nick O'Leary, member of the Queercore band The Jerk Offs, meets college-bound Norah Silverberg when she asks him to be her boyfriend for five minutes.

title: Meet the Feebles
simple_desc: Multiple animals and insects experience the sleazier side of show business while working on a variety show.

title: Take the Lead
simple_desc: The real story of a dance teacher who believed in the talent of a group of problem kids.

title: Eurovision Song Contest: The Story of Fire Saga
simple_desc: When aspiring musicians Lars and Sigrit are given the opportunity to represent their country at the world's biggest song competition, they finally have a chance to prove that any dream worth having is a dream worth fighting for.

title: Sister Act
simple_desc: When a nightclub singer is forced to take refuge from the mob in a convent, she ends up turning the convent choir into a soulful chorus complete with a Motown repertoire, until the sudden celebrity of the choir jeopardizes her identity.

title: Step Up
simple_desc: Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.

title: Ocean's Eleven
simple_desc: Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist. Together the eleven friends plan to rob five Las Vegas casinos in one night.

title: The Runaways
simple_desc: A coming-of-age biographical film about the 1970s teenage all-girl rock band The Runaways. The relationship between band members Cherie Currie and Joan Jett is also explored.

title: Purple Rain
simple_desc: A young musician, tormented by an abusive situation at home, must contend with a rival singer, a burgeoning romance, and his own dissatisfied band, as his star begins to rise.

title: Music and Lyrics
simple_desc: A washed up singer is given a couple days to compose a chart-topping hit for an aspiring teen sensation. Though he's never written a decent lyric in his life, he sparks with an offbeat younger woman with a flair for words.

title: Pitch Perfect 2
simple_desc: After a humiliating command performance at The Kennedy Center, the Barden Bellas enter an international competition that no American group has ever won in order to regain their status and right to perform.

title: Trolls
simple_desc: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

title: Burlesque
simple_desc: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

title: Happy Feet
simple_desc: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

title: A Bigger Splash
simple_desc: A famous rock star's vacation in Italy with her boyfriend is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter.

title: Step Up Revolution
simple_desc: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.

title: The Bodyguard
simple_desc: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to an R&B singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.

title: Freaky Friday
simple_desc: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.

title: Get Him to the Greek
simple_desc: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.

title: Rio 2
simple_desc: It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel, and their three kids after they're hurtled from Rio de Janeiro to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel and meets his father-in-law.

title: Rock Star
simple_desc: Lead singer of a tribute band becomes lead singer of the real band he idolizes.

title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
simple_desc: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

title: To Rome with Love
simple_desc: The lives of some visitors and residents of Rome and the romances, adventures and predicaments they get into.

title: David Brent: Life on the Road
simple_desc: A camera crew catches up with David Brent, the former star of the fictional British TV series The Office (2001), as he now fancies himself a rock star on the road.

title: Dick Tracy
simple_desc: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

title: Flashdance
simple_desc: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.

title: A Night at the Roxbury
simple_desc: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.

title: Wayne's World 2
simple_desc: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

title: The Perfection
simple_desc: When troubled musical prodigy Charlotte seeks out Elizabeth, the new star pupil of her former school, the encounter sends both musicians down a sinister path with shocking consequences.

title: Save the Last Dance
simple_desc: A white midwestern girl moves to Chicago, where her new boyfriend is a black teen from the South Side with a rough, semi-criminal past.

title: Shall We Dance
simple_desc: A romantic comedy where a bored, overworked Estate Lawyer, upon first sight of a beautiful instructor, signs up for ballroom dancing lessons.

title: Step Up 2: The Streets
simple_desc: Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.

title: The Rocker
simple_desc: In the 1980s, a drummer is abandoned by his band just before they become rock superstars. Twenty years later, the drummer sees his second chance at stardom arise when he is asked to perform with his teenage nephew's high school rock band.

title: We Are Your Friends
simple_desc: Caught between a forbidden romance and the expectations of his friends, aspiring DJ Cole Carter attempts to find the path in life that leads to fame and fortune.

title: Step Up 3D
simple_desc: A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.

title: I'm Still Here
simple_desc: Documents Joaquin Phoenix's transition from the acting world to a career as an aspiring rapper.

title: Marry Me
simple_desc: Music superstars Kat Valdez and Bastian are getting married before a global audience of fans. But when Kat learns, seconds before her vows, that Bastian has been unfaithful, she instead decides to marry Charlie, a stranger in the crowd.

title: Airheads
simple_desc: Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head D.J. refuses to play them.

title: The Last Song
simple_desc: A rebellious girl is sent to a Southern beach town for the summer to stay with her father. Through their mutual love of music, the estranged duo learn to reconnect.

title: Ricki and the Flash
simple_desc: A musician who gave up everything for her dream of rock-and-roll stardom returns home, looking to make things right with her family.

title: Bill & Ted Face the Music
simple_desc: Once told they'd save the universe during a time-traveling adventure, two would-be rockers from San Dimas, California find themselves as middle-aged dads still trying to crank out a hit song and fulfill their destiny.
The famous 1970s New York City nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

title: All Eyez on Me
simple_desc: Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur.

title: Step Up All In
simple_desc: All-stars from the previous Step Up installments come together in glittering Las Vegas, battling for a victory that could define their dreams and their careers.

title: Drumline
simple_desc: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

title: Captain Corelli's Mandolin
simple_desc: When a fisherman leaves to fight with the Greek army during World War II, his fiancée falls in love with the local Italian commander.

title: Dirty Dancing: Havana Nights
simple_desc: High school senior Katey moves to Havana in November 1958, when her dad gets a promotion at Ford. She meets a local waiter, who introduces her to sensual Cuban music/dance. They enter a big dance contest for the prize when he gets fired.

title: Pitch Perfect 3
simple_desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices.

title: Footloose
simple_desc: City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

title: Happy Feet Two
simple_desc: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

title: Raise Your Voice
simple_desc: A girl from a small town heads to the big city of Los Angeles to spend the summer at a performing arts high school.

title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
simple_desc: This story explores love - the shapes it takes, the ways it changes us and the exhilarating and often terrifying ride it takes us on. It is the journey of two characters, Alizeh and Ayan, as they navigate life, love and heartbreak.

title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
simple_desc: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.

title: Coyote Ugly
simple_desc: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.

title: Last Days
simple_desc: A Seattle musician's life and career are reminiscent of those of Kurt Cobain.

title: Magic Mike XXL
simple_desc: Three years after Mike bowed out of the stripper life at the top of his game, he and the remaining Kings of Tampa hit the road to Myrtle Beach to put on one last blow-out performance.

title: Josie and the Pussycats
simple_desc: A girl group find themselves in the middle of a conspiracy to deliver subliminal messages through popular music.

title: Be Cool
simple_desc: Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.

title: Song to Song
simple_desc: Two intersecting love triangles. Obsession and betrayal set against the music scene in Austin, Texas.

title: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
simple_desc: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

title: American Dreamz
simple_desc: The new season of "American Dreamz," the wildly popular television singing contest, has captured the country's attention, as the competition looks to be between a young Midwestern gal (Moore) and a showtunes-loving young man from Orange County (Golzari). Recently awakened President Staton (Quaid) even wants in on the craze, as he signs up for the potential explosive season finale.

title: Stomp the Yard
simple_desc: When his brother is murdered, a street dancer moves to Georgia to work his way through college. He joins a fraternity's step dancing team for a competition. Will he also get an education and the girl?

title: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
simple_desc: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from a life of crime to pursue his passion of rap music.

title: Honey
simple_desc: Honey is a sexy, tough music video choreographer who shakes up her life after her mentor gives her an ultimatum: sleep with him or be blacklisted within their industry.

title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
simple_desc: Three musical chipmunks are discovered by an aspiring songwriter who wants to use their amazing singing abilities to become famous.

title: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
simple_desc: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
simple_desc: The Chipmunks believe that Dave plans to propose to his new girlfriend in Miami.--and dump them. They have three days to get to him and save themselves not only from losing Dave but also from gaining a terrible stepbrother.

title: Blues Brothers 2000
simple_desc: Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God."

title: Happy New Year
simple_desc: A gang of amateur dancers takes part in a dancing competition to avenge their personal vendetta.

title: 9 Songs
simple_desc: In London, intense sexual encounters take place between an American college student, named Lisa, and an English scientist, named Matt, between attending rock concerts.
stars: ["Kieran O'Brien", 'Margo Stilley', 'Robert Levon Been', 'Black Rebel Motorcycle Club']

title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
simple_desc: A teenage girl is convinced that her home city revolves around her until her family packs up and moves to the suburbs, where she finds herself competing for attention.

title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
simple_desc: As Hannah Montana's popularity begins to take over her life, Miley Stewart, on the urging from her father takes a trip to her hometown of Crowley Corners, Tennessee to get some perspective on what matters in life the most.

title: Grease 2
simple_desc: A British student at a 1960s American high school must prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
simple_desc: The world-famous singing preteen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
simple_desc: Playing around while aboard a cruise ship, the Chipmunks and Chipettes accidentally go overboard and end up marooned in a tropical paradise. They discover their new turf is not as deserted as it seems.

title: You Got Served
simple_desc: In order to achieve their dream of opening a recording studio, two friends (Omarion, Houston) must first win their city's dance contest -- a fierce competition that pits them against a group of tough street dancers.

title: Spice World
simple_desc: World famous pop group the Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

title: Spy Kids 4: All the Time in the World
simple_desc: A retired spy is called back into action, and to bond with her new step-children, she invites them along for the adventure to stop the evil Timekeeper from taking over the world.

title: Bratz
simple_desc: During their first year of high school, four best girlfriends face off against the domineering student body President, who wants to split them up into different social cliques.

title: Glitter
simple_desc: A young singer dates a disc jockey who helps her get into the music business, but their relationship become complicated as she ascends to super stardom.
